duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead new and renewal business production underwriting of monoline pollution business.
Adhere to underwriting authority and guidelines for building a profitable book of business.
Develop strong customer relationships by providing top-notch service in Site Pollution Liability, Contractors Pollution Liability, and Contractors Pollution & Professional Liability.
Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine strategies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or above and insurance certifications, with 5-10 years of experience in monoline pollution production underwriting, including contaminated property transactions and construction wrap-up projects.
